CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnBehave
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
if self.ParentAI.time >= 1 then self.ParentAI.time = 0
local MonsterEntity = self.ParentAI.Entity local Direction = nil local FlipX = false
local RandomAction = _UtilLogic:RandomIntegerRange(1, 10)
if RandomAction >= 1 and RandomAction <= 4 then MonsterEntity.StateComponent:ChangeState("MOVE") MonsterEntity.SpriteRendererComponent.FlipX = false MonsterEntity.MovementComponent:MoveToDirection(Vector2(-1, 0), 0.5) log("left") elseif RandomAction >= 5 and RandomAction <= 8 then MonsterEntity.StateComponent:ChangeState("MOVE") MonsterEntity.SpriteRendererComponent.FlipX = true MonsterEntity.MovementComponent:MoveToDirection(Vector2(1, 0), 0.5) log("right") elseif RandomAction >= 9 and RandomAction <= 10 then MonsterEntity.StateComponent:ChangeState("IDLE") MonsterEntity.MovementComponent:Stop() log("stop") end end
return BehaviourTreeStatus.Success
